PHP Gpx handling
  gpx - https://github.com/Sibyx/phpGPX
  
  
  
  
Leaflet mapping
Leaflet itself
http://leafletjs.com/

Clustering - https://github.com/Leaflet/Leaflet.markercluster
Display Google Maps - https://gitlab.com/IvanSanchez/Leaflet.GridLayer.GoogleMutant
Promise - https://github.com/stefanpenner/es6-promise
Mapcodes - http://www.mapcode.com/
           https://github.com/mapcode-foundation/mapcode-js
		   
Fullscreen - https://github.com/Leaflet/Leaflet.fullscreen	

Drawing route
Leaflet.Draw - https://github.com/Leaflet/Leaflet.draw
Display GPX file - https://github.com/mpetazzoni/leaflet-gpx
Elevation plot - https://github.com/MrMufflon/Leaflet.Elevation - modified??
Print - https://github.com/Igor-Vladyka/leaflet.browser.print

OS to/from Lat/Long conversion - http://www.movable-type.co.uk/scripts/latlong-os-gridref.html	   

Simplify - reduce number of points 
    http://mourner.github.io/simplify-js/
    https://github.com/mourner/simplify-js  

Blurt popup
    https://github.com/brijeshb42/blurt/
Download saveas option
    https://github.com/eligrey/FileSaver.js

Bing
https://github.com/shramov/leaflet-plugins
